Description: # FIXME no transit subzones so all zones short walk to transit

Expression: origin_density.map({k: v for k, v in Taxi_waitTime_mean.items()})
origin_density.map({k: v for k, v in Taxi_waitTime_sd.items()})
dest_density.map({k: v for k, v in Taxi_waitTime_mean.items()})
dest_density.map({k: v for k, v in Taxi_waitTime_sd.items()})
Note that the mean and standard deviation are not the values for the distribution itself  but of the underlying normal distribution it is derived from
rng.lognormal_for_df(df, mu=origin_zone_taxi_wait_time_mean, sigma=origin_zone_taxi_wait_time_sd, broadcast=True, scale=True).clip(min_waitTime, max_waitTime)
rng.lognormal_for_df(df, mu=dest_zone_taxi_wait_time_mean, sigma=dest_zone_taxi_wait_time_sd, broadcast=True, scale=True).clip(min_waitTime, max_waitTime)
